mapper.select: select * from mod_info where modName = #{jsonObj.modName} and userName = #{jsonObj.userName} limit 1
select count(*) from mod_camera where cameraIndex= #{cameraIndex}

select sum(t.jrls) jrls, sum(t.sxtsl) sxtsl,sum(t.sfmxsl) sfmxsl from ( select count(*) jrls,0 sxtsl,0 sfmxsl from algorithm union all select 0 jrls,count(*) sxtsl,0 sfmxsl from camera union all select 0 jrls,0 sxtsl,count(*) sfmxsl from algorithmacc) t limit 1

select sum(sxtsl) sxtsl,sum(kqsl) kqsl,sum(gbsl) gbsl,sum(fzr) fzr,sum(jrls) jrls,sum(yxzsl) yxzsl,sum(ycsl) ycsl,sum(bjs) bjs from ( select count(*) sxtsl,0 kqsl,0 gbsl,0 fzr,0 jrls,0 yxzsl,0 ycsl,0 bjs from camera union all select 0 sxtsl,count(*) kqsl,0 gbsl,0 fzr,0 jrls,0 yxzsl,0 ycsl,0 bjs from camera where state='运行中' union all select 0 sxtsl,0 kqsl,count(*) gbsl,0 fzr,0 jrls,0 yxzsl,0 ycsl,0 bjs from camera where state='关闭' union all select 0 sxtsl,0 kqsl,0 gbsl,0 fzr,count(*) jrls,0 yxzsl,0 ycsl,0 bjs from algorithm union all select 0 sxtsl,0 kqsl,0 gbsl,0 fzr,0 jrls,count(*) yxzsl,0 ycsl,0 bjs from algorithm where state='运行中' union all select 0 sxtsl,0 kqsl,0 gbsl,0 fzr,0 jrls,0 yxzsl,count(*) ycsl,0 bjs from algorithm where state='异常' union all select 0 sxtsl,0 kqsl,0 gbsl,0 fzr,0 jrls,0 yxzsl,0 ycsl,count(*) bjs from algorithmalarm) t limit 1
select user_ids from algorithm
select FROM_UNIXTIME(alarm_time/1000,'%d') as days,count(id) as num from algorithmalarm where FROM_UNIXTIME(alarm_time/1000,'%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y-%m') GROUP BY days ORDER BY days

select FROM_UNIXTIME(alarm_time/1000,'%d') as days,count(id) num from algorithmalarm where FROM_UNIXTIME(alarm_time/1000,'%Y-%m') = date_format(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 month),'%Y-%m') GROUP BY days ORDER BY days
select count(*) as total from algorithmalarm where FROM_UNIXTIME(alarm_time/1000,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y-%m-%d')

select t.algorithm_id,t.algorithm_name,sum(num) num from ( select id algorithm_id,title algorithm_name,0 num from algorithmacc union all select algorithm_id,algorithm_name, count(*) as num from algorithmalarm where FROM_UNIXTIME(alarm_time/1000,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY algorithm_id,algorithm_name ) t GROUP BY algorithm_id,algorithm_name

select algorithm_id,algorithm_name,sum(bjs) bjs,sum(qrs) qrs from ( select algorithm_id,algorithm_name,count(*) as bjs, 0 as qrs from algorithmalarm where FROM_UNIXTIME(alarm_time/1000,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY algorithm_id,algorithm_name union all select algorithm_id,algorithm_name,0 as bjs, count(*) asqrs from algorithmalarm where state='已确认' and FROM_UNIXTIME(alarm_time/1000,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY algorithm_id,algorithm_name ) t GROUP BY algorithm_id,algorithm_name

select algorithm_id,algorithm_name,sum(algorithm_num) algorithm_num from ( select id as algorithm_id,title as algorithm_name,0 algorithm_num from algorithmacc union all select algorithm_id,algorithm_name,count(*) algorithm_num from algorithmalarm where state='未确认' GROUP BY algorithm_id,algorithm_name ) t GROUP BY algorithm_id,algorithm_name ORDER BY algorithm_num desc

select t1.id,t1.algorithm_id,t1.algorithm_title,t2.id camera_id,t2.title camera_title,t2.region_id,t2.region_title,t2.pushaddress,t2.videoa from algorithm t1 left join camera t2 on t1.camera_id= t2.id

SELECT t1.id,t1.title,t1.videoa,t1.state,t1.pushaddress,t2.border,t3.box, t1.region_id,t2.algorithm_id FROM camera t1 ,algorithm t2 ,algorithmalarm t3 where t2.camera_id=t1.id and t3.camera_id=t1.id and t3.state='未确认'
select region_title from algorithm group by region_title
select 0 algorithm_id,'接入路数' algorithm_title,count(*) num from algorithm union all select algorithm_id,algorithm_title,count(*) num from algorithm group by algorithm_id,algorithm_title
select algorithm_id,algorithm_name,count(*) num from algorithmalarm group by algorithm_id,algorithm_name

select DATE_FORMAT(now()+ interval 4 hour,'%H:00') hour ,count(*) num from algorithmalarm where DATE_FORMAT(now() + interval 4+1 hour,'%y-%m-%d %H:00') > alarm_time and alarm_time >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_FORMAT(now() + interval 4 hour,'%y-%m-%d %H:00')) union select DATE_FORMAT(now()+ interval 5 hour,'%H:00') hour ,count(*) num from algorithmalarm where DATE_FORMAT(now() + interval 5+1 hour,'%y-%m-%d %H:00') > alarm_time and alarm_time >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_FORMAT(now() + interval 5 hour,'%y-%m-%d %H:00')) union select DATE_FORMAT(now()+ interval 6 hour,'%H:00') hour ,count(*) num from algorithmalarm where DATE_FORMAT(now() + interval 6+1 hour,'%y-%m-%d %H:00') > alarm_time and alarm_time >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_FORMAT(now() + interval 6 hour,'%y-%m-%d %H:00')) union select DATE_FORMAT(now()+ interval 7 hour,'%H:00') hour ,count(*) num from algorithmalarm where DATE_FORMAT(now() + interval 7+1 hour,'%y-%m-%d %H:00') > alarm_time and alarm_time >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_FORMAT(now() + interval 7 hour,'%y-%m-%d %H:00')) union select DATE_FORMAT(now()+ interval 8 hour,'%H:00') hour ,count(*) num from algorithmalarm where DATE_FORMAT(now() + interval 8+1 hour,'%y-%m-%d %H:00') > alarm_time and alarm_time >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_FORMAT(now() + interval 8 hour,'%y-%m-%d %H:00')) union select DATE_FORMAT(now()+ interval 9 hour,'%H:00') hour ,count(*) num from algorithmalarm where DATE_FORMAT(now() + interval 9+1 hour,'%y-%m-%d %H:00') > alarm_time and alarm_time >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_FORMAT(now() + interval 9 hour,'%y-%m-%d %H:00'))
